Class-Ranger 20 -- Female Skilled Heritage Human Ranger: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 20 (+5)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 40 Size: Medium
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Favored Terrain (Plains): +10 Speed
Fleet: +5 Speed
Favored Terrain (Aquatic): May move normally through underwater difficult terrain/40' swim Speed
Favored Terrain (Arctic): May move normally over icy or snowy difficult terrain without a need to Balance
Favored Terrain (Desert): May move normally over sandy difficult terrain without a need to Balance
Favored Terrain (Forest): May move normally over forested difficult terrain/40' climb Speed
Favored Terrain (Mountain): May move normally over mountainous difficult terrain/40' climb Speed
Favored Terrain (Plains): May move normally over difficult terrain in plains
Favored Terrain (Sky): May move normally through difficult terrain in the sky/40' fly Speed
Favored Terrain (Swamp): May move normally over boggy greater difficult terrain
Favored Terrain (Underground): May move normally over underground difficult terrain/40' climb Speed
Feather Step: May Step into difficult terrain
Terrain Master: May train for 1 hour to temporarily change favored terrain
Ultimate Skirmisher: May move normally over difficult, greater difficult, and hazardous terrain
Wild Stride: May move normally over non-magical difficult terrain

Ancestry Feats; Skilled Heritage Human
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
General Feats: 5 selections
Hunter's Edge: 1 selection
Ranger Feats: 11 selections
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Adopted Ancestry: May take ancestry feats from chosen ancestry
Animal Companion: Has a young animal companion that gains Hunt Prey and Flurry, Precision, or Outwit effects
Favored Terrain (Arctic): Can survive on 1/10 normal food and water
Favored Terrain (Desert): Can survive on 1/10 normal food and water
Incredible Companion: Animal Companion gains choice of nimble or savage characteristics
Mature Animal Companion: Animal Companion is a mature companion and may Stride or Strike without a command
Specialized Companion: Animal Companion has choice of specialization
Triple Threat: May use Hunt Prey with 3 targets, share two-target Hunt Prey with 1 ally, or share single-target Hunt Prey effects with 2 allies
Perception: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Skill Modifiers:
Absalom Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Games Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Accounting Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Hunting Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Society: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Acrobatics: +4 (dexterity; untrained) Intimidation: +27 (charisma; trained) Stealth: +30 (dexterity; master)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Labor Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +34 (wisdom; %1)
Athletics: +4 (strength; untrained) Medicine: +4 (wisdom; untrained) Thievery: +4 (dexterity; untrained)
Circus Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +34 (wisdom; %1) Troll Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Crafting: +30 (intelligence; master) Occultism: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Underworld Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Deception: +5 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +5 (charisma; untrained)
Diplomacy: +5 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Languages: Aquan; Celestial; Common; Halfling; Ignan; Orcish
Skill Notes:
Incredible Senses: Perception Legendary
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Ranger Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Survival; Choose 8 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Absalom Lore): Skill Trained (Absalom Lore)
Skill Training (Accounting Lore): Skill Trained (Accounting Lore)
Skill Training (Circus Lore): Skill Trained (Circus Lore)
Skill Training (Games Lore): Skill Trained (Games Lore)
Skilled Heritage Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Ubiquitous Snares: Increased Snare Specialist effects
Vigilant Senses: Perception Master
Assurance (Absalom Lore): May take 10 on Absalom Lore rolls
Assurance (Games Lore): May take 10 on Games Lore rolls
Assurance (Labor Lore): May take 10 on Labor Lore rolls
Assurance (Religion): May take 10 on Religion rolls
Camouflage: May Hide and Sneak in natural terrain without cover
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures when using Aid with expert skills are successes
Expeditious Search: May Search at 4x normal speed
Experienced Tracker: May Track at full Speed/Does not require a new roll every hour to Track
Hazard Finder: +1 Perception to find traps; may find traps even when not searching
Hunt Prey: +2 Perception to Seek and +2 Survival to Track designated creature
Lightning Snares: May craft a trap with 1 action
Master Monster Hunter: May use Nature to Recall Knowledge to identify any creature
Masterful Hunter: +4 Perception to Seek a Hunt Prey target
Masterful Hunter: +4 Survival to Track a Hunt Prey target
Outwit: +2 Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, and Recall Knowledge checks with a Hunt Prey target
Powerful Snares: Created snares have a DC of at least 40
Quick Snares: May prepare snares with 3 actions
Sense The Unseen: May use a Reaction on a failed Seek to make undetected foes hidden
Shadow Hunter: Has continuous concealment from foes other than Hunt Prey targets in natural surroundings
Snare Crafting: May use Craft to create snares; knows the formulas for 4 common snares
Snare Specialist: Knows the formulas for 6 snares; may prepare 12 each day
Stealthy Companion: Companion gains benefits of Camouflage; ambusher companion gains an increase in Stealth rank
Student Of The Canon: All critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Cannot fail to Recall Knowledge about own faith
Swift Tracker: May Track at full Speed
To The Ends Of The Earth: May follow a Hunt Prey target across any distance
Trackless Step: Has the benefits of the Cover Tracks action while moving at full Speed in natural terrain
Warden's Guidance: Failures and critical failures on Seek of a Hunt Prey target by self and allies are successes
Warden's Step: May include allies in an Avoid Notice action in natural terrain
Wild Empathy: May use Diplomacy with animals to Make an Impression and to make simple Requests
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (4 max); master) Class DC: Ranger: 40 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Light Pick (+30 1d4+4 P [Crit d8]); Longbow (+30 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R200'); Pick (+30 1d6+4 P [Crit d10])
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Far Shot: Doubles ranged weapon increments
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Legendary Monster Hunter: Increased Monster Hunter effects
Masterful Hunter: Class Master (Ranger)
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Ranger Expertise: Class Expert (Ranger)
Ranger Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Second Skin: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Expertise: Attack Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Unconventional Weaponry: Attack Trained (Choose 1 from any)/Treats chosen weapon as one category lower
Weapon Mastery: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Blind-Fight: May attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 check/Does not suffer flat-footed with hidden foes
Companion's Cry: May use 2 actions for Command an Animal to give companion an additional action
Crossbow Ace: Crossbow inflicts +2 HP damage on a Hunt Prey target or immediately after reloading; simple crossbow also increases damage die by 1 step
Deadly Aim: May suffer -2 ranged Strike penalty vs. a Hunt Prey target to gain +8 HP damage
Disrupt Prey: May use a Reaction to to make a Strike on a Hunt Prey target; critical success disrupts its action
Distracting Shot: Critical or double hit on a Hunt Prey target inflicts flat-footed for 1 rd
Double Prey: May use Hunt Prey on two targets
Favored Enemy: May use Hunt Prey with chosen creature type as a free action during initiative
Flurry: Reduces penalty for second/third attack on a Hunt Prey target to -3/-6 (-2/-4 with an agile weapon)
Greater Distracting Shot: Ranged hit on a Hunt Prey target inflicts flat-footed for 1 rd
Hazard Finder: +1 Armor Class vs. traps
Hunted Shot: May use 1 action to make two ranged Strikes against a Hunt Prey target 1/rd
Hunter's Aim: May use 2 actions to gain +2 attack and ignore concealment of a Hunt Prey target
Impossible Flurry: May use 3 actions to make 3 melee Strikes at the maximum multiple attack penalty
Impossible Volley: May use 3 actions to make a -2 ranged Strike against all foes in a 10' radius
Improved Twin Riposte: May use an additional Reaction to make a Twin Riposte 1/tn
Legendary Shot: May ignore five range increments when attacking a Hunt Prey target with a master proficiency weapon
Manifold Edge: May use a different hunter's edge benefit with Hunt Prey
Master Monster Hunter: Monster Hunter effects take effect on simple success
Masterful Companion: Companion gains Masterful Hunter effects vs. a Hunt Prey target
Masterful Hunter: No range penalty when attacking a Hunt Prey target in the 2nd or 3rd range increment of a ranged weapon with master proficiency
Monster Hunter: May attempt to Recall Knowledge as part of Hunt Prey action; critical success gives +2 attack to self and allies for 1 rd
Monster Warden: Successful use of Monster Hunter also gives self and allies +2 Armor Class on next attack and +2 on next save vs. a Hunt Prey target
Nature's Edge: Foes suffer flat-footed vs. self in in natural and snare-imposed difficult terrain
Outwit: +1 Armor Class vs. a Hunt Prey target
Penetrating Shot: May use 2 actions to Strike both a target and a creature giving it lesser cover
Perfect Shot: May use 3 actions to inflict maximum damage with a ranged attack on a Hunt Prey target
Precision: First hit on a Hunt Prey target inflicts +3d8 HP precision damage each rd
Quick Draw: May use 1 action to draw a weapon and Strike
Ranger Weapon Expertise: May use critical specialization effects of unarmed attacks and simple and martial weapons when attacking a Hunt Prey target
Running Reload: May Reload during Stride, Step, and Sneak
Scout's Warning: May give allies +1 initiative
Second Skin: May rest normally in light or medium armor
Second Sting: Failed Strike with a weapon in one hand inflicts non-dice damage of the weapon in the other
Shared Prey: May share with an ally the benefits of Hunt Prey and Flurry, Outwit, or Precision on a single target
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Side By Side: Self and companion automatically flank a foe adjacent to both
Skirmish Strike: May use 1 action to Step and Strike
Snap Shot: May use a ranged weapon during a Reaction to Strike an adjacent creature
Swift Prey: May use Hunt Prey as a free action at the beginning of each rd
Targeting Shot: Ranged attack vs. a Hunt Prey target ignores cover and concealment
Twin Parry: May parry with two weapons to gain +1 AC for 1 rd (+2 AC with weapon parry trait)
Twin Riposte: May use a Reaction to Strike or Disarm a foe who critically fails a Strike on self
Twin Takedown: May use 1 action to make a melee Strike with each hand against a Hunt Prey target 1/rd
Warden's Boon: May share Hunt Prey benefits with an ally for 1 rd
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +32 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Improved Evasion: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Iron Will: Save Expert (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Improved Evasion: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures/Suffers half normal damage from failed Reflex saves
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Ultimate Skirmisher: Never triggers movement-connected traps
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 68 allocated
Ranger Hunter's Edge Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
